overview: A compilation of company advertisements. In 1959 Harry Lewing directed the ad Seitsemän hunnun uni for Suomen Trikoo, and in the same year Allan Pyykkö made an ad for the pharmaceutical factory Star Oy, which manufactured the famous Hota powder, among other things. In addition, the compilation includes ads for the Otra department store and the Tampere swimming hall.
title: Ads From Tampere
